name: Rubius
description:
Rubius develops enterprise and engineering software (mobile, web, desktop). We are motivated by solving customer's problems and working on challenging projects. For this, we have 100 employees (10 of them with Ph.D.'s), cutting edge technologies and deep expertise in specific domain areas including:
Enterprise and Engineering Applications
3D Visualization
Cross-platform Development
Machine Learning/Big Data
Based out of Tomsk, Siberia, Rubius provides 5 benefits to its clients:
We aim to understand customer’s needs, not just “coding on a specification”.
We provide free estimation and technical proposal without any obligations from customers.
We work using Agile and Fixed-Price approaches. We have a great experience working with existing teams on customer's side.
We focus on communications and always keep our customers updated. Our team speaks English fluently
We try to find the simplest and the most productive solution.
